summary: This mod adds a standalone follower at the hall of the dead in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Trebuchet MS]
[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/1/269/31883986243_3425401453_c.jpg[/img]

[size=3][color=#f1c232]Succubus-san[/color](サキュバスさん)[/size]

[color=#cc0000][size=4]=== Dawnguard Required ===[/size][/color]

Succubus-san is a Succubus*ish follower.
She is a standalone follower which means no other mods will be required.
You can find her at the hall of the dead in Whiterun.
She is Marriageable and Essential.

She has her own spell(Red lightning bolt), so I don't recommend to change her spell and combat style with a mod overhaul mod.


[color=#900000]Race[/color]
Nord(yup Nord)

[color=#900000]Weight[/color]
50

[color=#900000]Voice[/color]
YoungEagerFemale as always


[color=#900000][size=3]Spells[/size][/color]

Red lightning bolt
Drain
Dread Zombie
Conjure Mistman
Conjure Boneman
Fury
Frenzy
is she Serana?

[color=#900000][size=3]Skills[/size][/color]

Fighting stance
Light foot
Armsman 10, 20
Agile defender 00


[color=#900000][size=3]Recommended mods[/size][/color]

Follower overhaul mod such as AFT
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35303/?]Female Facial Animation[/url] by nao4288 <= [color=#ffd966]Highly Recommended[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568/?]Relationship Dialogue Overhaul - RDO[/url] by cloudedtruth
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30533/?]Face to face conversation[/url] by towawot

[color=#900000][size=3]Mods used on the screenshots[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67309/?]KS Jewelry[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69784/?]RUSTIC CLOTHING[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65528/?]Ravenholm - Vampire House[/url]
[url=http://robton.nu/vanilla-armors-and-clothes-tmb/]Vanilla Armors and Clothes – TMB[/url] ←This link is out of Nexus
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78249/?]Iron things _IRON BATLLE AXE_ added[/url]
[/center]
[youtube]liFz7nIYFjo[/youtube] [youtube]J-qjJSss4j4[/youtube]
[center]
[color=#900000][size=3]Q&A[/size][/color]
[spoiler]

[color=#ffd966]Q[/color] : Custom voice?
[color=#cc0000]A[/color] : nope... forever

[color=#ffd966]Q[/color] : RaceMenu preset?
[color=#cc0000]A[/color] : You can already import her head mesh with RaceMenu, please google it.
I created her with ECE so I don't have her RM preset in the first place..

[color=#ffd966]Q[/color] : I want to remove her annoying horns!
[color=#cc0000]A[/color] : Use one of the follower overhaul mods such as AFT

[color=#ffd966]Q[/color] : I want to change her cat eyes!
[color=#cc0000]A[/color] : Switch her eye texture.
Pick up eye texture from the eye mod and rename it as RWWitcherVivid
and overwrite the following file.
Data/textures/actors/character/Succubus-san/eyes/RWWitcherVivid

[color=#ffd966]Q[/color] : She looks ugly in my game!
[color=#cc0000]A[/color] : Try ENB or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73473/?]Quick Light[/url] if you don't use enb.

[color=#ffd966]Q[/color] : I want to remove her summon spell that makes the annoying ash piles all over.
[color=#cc0000]A[/color] : Ikr :p

[1]
Load only Succubus-san.esp in TES5Edit

[2]
Open the left panel tree of [03] Succubus-san.esp => Non-Player Character (Actor)

[3]
Click 0300809B Succubus-san and see the right panel

[4]
Find out DreadZombie spell and remove it

[5]
Save and done

[color=#d5a6bd]If she still uses that spell, then retrieve her items you gave and dismiss her
=> skip time till she disappears from the cell
=> save and quit skyrim
[/color][color=#d5a6bd]=> Uninstall this mod and load the save you made just now and save again
=> Install her again => Done!
[/color]
[color=#ffd966]Q[/color] : I want to change her boring name!
[color=#cc0000]A[/color] : Use TES5Edit.

[color=#ffd966]Q[/color] : I want to change her hairstyle.
[color=#cc0000]A[/color] : Try these wig mods because it's complicated to change standalone follower's hairstyle by yourself.

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73137/?
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48470/?
[/spoiler]


[color=#900000][size=3]How to change her body type[/size][/color]
[spoiler]

[1]
Copy the following 2 body meshes which you want to use from the body mod.
If you want to use the same body as the player character, copy them from Data/meshes/actors/character/character assets/here

femalebody_0
femalebody_1

[2]
Overwrite Succubus-san meshes Data/meshes/actors/character/Succubus-san/here by [1]'s files.
*Copy and overwrite the following files as well if the hands and feet have any seams on the characters.

femalefeet_0
femalefeet_1
femalehands_0
femalehands_1

[3]
Done.


*You have to change her skin textures as well by yourself if you want to use the special body which doesn't correspond to UNP or CBBE textures.
Skin textures are
Data/textures/actors/character/Succubus-san/here, so you just replace these files if you want to change.
[/spoiler]

Thank you very much, great modders!


[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/1/618/32366143250_e6eb8c2e9d_b.jpg[/img]

author: rxkx22
